question: Which major technology firm recently became the fourth US company to touch $1 trillion valuation?
explanation:
The parent company of Google, Alphabet led by Indian-American Sundar Pichai, touched the milestone of $1 trillion valuation and joined the elite US companies in the list, which includes Apple, Microsoft and Amazon. Apple was the first US company to touch the $1 trillion mark, when it achieved the feat in 2018.
During the month of December last year, the founders of Alphabet Larry Page and Sergey Brin stepped down from their leadership roles and announced the then CEO of Google Sundar Pichai as the CEO of both Google and Alphabet.
